attributes.action: Appeal against the legal use of cannabis petition on the 12th October 2015
attributes.background: We would like to appeal against the decison on making cannabis safe sale and legal  use withing the United Kingdom, it has been proving to save life and would help us build a strong economy

rejection.details:
No decision was taken on this issue on 12 October 2015.

It's clear from your petition that you would like cannabis to be legalised. The existing petition on legalising cannabis is still open for new signatures until 21 January 2016 so we cannot accept a duplicate. It is still possible for MPs to seek further debates or action on this issue if they wish to do so. 

The petition is here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104349
